title: Standalone Data Logger with Advanced Configuration
name: LGF_DataLogC
description: Function integrates all the datalog system functions and can be used as standalone data logger.

input.name: name
input.description: Name of datalog, also used as file name

input.name: triggerLogEntry
input.description: Rising edge trigger one entry in data log (only if `parameter.isLoggingByInterval` := FALSE)

input.name: clearLog
input.description: Rising edge triggering clearing of datalog file

input.name: deleteLog
input.description: Rising edge triggering deletion of datalog file if exist

input.name: parameter
input.description: This UDT belongs to the Module `LGF_DataLogC` and lists all possible parameter to configure its behaviour.

output.name: valid
output.description: TRUE: Valid set of output values available at the FB

output.name: busy
output.description: TRUE: FB is not finished and new output values can be expected

output.name: error
output.description: TRUE: An error occurred during the execution of the FB

output.name: status
output.description: Status of the FB, Error identification

output.name: lastEntryReached
output.description: TRUE: Last entry of datalog reached, if `enableRingBuffer` is set, start from beginning, otherwise block ends here

output.name: diagnostics
output.description: Diagnostic structure to store and transfer diagnostic information from blocks trough the interface.

in/out.name: data
in/out.description: Data structure to log in datalog file

user_defined_types.name: LGF_typeDataLogParameter
user_defined_types.description: This UDT belongs to the Module LGF_DataLogC and lists all possible parameter to configure its behaviour.

member.name: header
member.description: Headline of datalog, string of all data fields, separated by a comma: "field1,field2,field3,..."

member.name: maxNumberOfEntries
member.description: Maximum number of entries in datalog

member.name: clearOnOpen
member.description: Clear datalog during opening datalog while enabling block

member.name: deleteFile
member.description: Delete as well datalog file during datalog delete

member.name: enableRingBuffer
member.description: TRUE: Overwrite old values and start from the beginning if datalog reaches its maximum entries FALSE: Stop logging if `maxNumberOfEntries` entries reached

member.name: loggingByInterval
member.description: TRUE: Log on interval time parameter FALSE: log on "triggerEntry"

user_defined_types.name: LGF_typeDiagnostics
user_defined_types.description: Diagnostic structure to store and transfer diagnostic information from blocks trough the interface.

member.name: status
member.description: Status of the Block or error identification when error occurred

member.name: subfunctionStatus
member.description: Status or return value of called FB's, FC's and system blocks

member.name: stateNumber
member.description: State in the state machine of the block where the error occurred
